meanings.definition: To enjoy oneself in a luxurious way.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she luxuriated in a warm bubble bath.
meanings.sent2: The cat luxuriated in the sunbeam streaming through the window.
meanings.sent3: The puppy luxuriated in rolling around on the soft grass.
meanings.sent4: The flowers luxuriated in the abundant sunlight, blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: As the music played, she luxuriated in the peaceful atmosphere of her room.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: He luxuriated in the delicious flavors of the homemade meal.
meanings.sent2: The children luxuriated in the excitement of opening their presents on Christmas morning.
meanings.sent3: She luxuriated in the joy of spending time with her loved ones.
meanings.sent4: The artist luxuriated in the vibrant colors of the sunset, finding inspiration for his next painting.
meanings.sent5: The audience luxuriated in the beautiful music, feeling transported to another world.

meanings.definition: To indulge in luxury or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: During the vacation, they luxuriated in the comfort of the luxurious hotel.
meanings.sent2: She luxuriated in the decadent taste of the rich chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat luxuriated in the warmth of the cozy blanket by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: He luxuriated in the relaxation of the spa day, feeling pampered and rejuvenated.
meanings.sent5: The couple luxuriated in the breathtaking views from their private balcony, savoring every moment.
